mapper.select: SELECT s.subject_id, s.subject_name AS subjectName, COUNT(CASE WHEN sv.solv_id IS NOT NULL AND sv.solv_right = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS wrongCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN sv.solv_right = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS correctCount, COALESCE(COUNT(sv.solv_id), 0) AS totalCount FROM `subject` s JOIN problem_cate pc ON s.subject_id = pc.subject_id LEFT JOIN problem p ON pc.problem_cate_id = p.problem_cate_id LEFT JOIN solv sv ON p.problem_id = sv.problem_id AND sv.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY s.subject_id ORDER BY s.subject_id

SELECT pc.problem_cate_name subjectName, s.subject_id subjectId, COUNT(CASE WHEN sv.solv_id IS NOT NULL AND sv.solv_right = 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS wrongCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN sv.solv_right = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS correctCount, COALESCE(COUNT(sv.solv_id), 0) AS totalCount FROM `subject` s JOIN problem_cate pc ON s.subject_id = pc.subject_id LEFT JOIN problem p ON pc.problem_cate_id = p.problem_cate_id LEFT JOIN solv sv ON p.problem_id = sv.problem_id AND sv.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY pc.problem_cate_name, s.subject_id, pc.problem_cate_id ORDER BY pc.problem_cate_id;
